CustomField.formula: CASE(MOD( Actual_Service_Date__c - DATE(1900, 1, 6), 7), 0, IMAGE( "/img/samples/color_red.gif", "red", 15, 5), 1, IMAGE( "/img/samples/color_red.gif", "red", 15, 5), 2, IMAGE( "/img/samples/color_yellow.gif", "yellow", 15, 10), 3, IMAGE( "/img/samples/color_green.gif", "yellow", 15, 15), 4, IMAGE( "/img/samples/color_yellow.gif", "yellow", 15, 20), 5, IMAGE( "/img/samples/color_green.gif", "yellow", 15, 25), 6, IMAGE( "/img/samples/color_yellow.gif", "yellow", 15, 30) ,"")
CustomField.label: Day Pic
